snippet.title: 20 Minutes of SOMBRERO at GameACon! 1920x1080 @60fps
snippet.description:
Here's 20 minutes of unedited, mostly bug-free footage of SOMBRERO being played at GameACon, a new Indie Game convention in Atlantic City, NJ that took place a few weeks ago at the Tropicana Casino & Resort. 

Sombrero won Best Music & Sound Design for the show, and got a shiny award for it, which is cool. We like shiny things.

We look forward to going back next year, it was a ton of fun!

-----

As always, this footage was recorded on our "show computer," which is an awe-inspiring...Dual-Core i3 with an nVidia 750Ti that cost about $350 total to slap into a cheap MiniATX case. So, you don't need an especially powerful computer to run Sombrero at full HD and 60fps. Optimization FTW!

---

Learn more about SOMBRERO:
http://sombrerogame.com

Social Media:
http://twitter.com/pixelmetal
http://facebook.com/pixelmetal
